column5: Study at Cranfield UniversityThe UK continues to lead the world in power and propulsion technology. In addition to its established aerospace role, the gas turbine is finding increasing application in power generation, oil and gas pumping, chemical processing and power plants for ships and other large vehicles.Gas Turbine Technology is a specialist option of the MSc in Thermal Power and Propulsion providing a comprehensive background in the design and operation of different types of gas turbines for all applications.
